text: Zachary Ruben Benson (born May 12, 2005) is a Canadian professional ice hockey left winger. He currently plays for the Buffalo Sabres of the National Hockey League (NHL). ==Career== Before playing in the NHL, Benson played parts of 3 seasons with the Winnipeg Ice of the Western Hockey League (WHL). He was drafted 13th overall by the Buffalo Sabres in the 2023 NHL Entry Draft. On July 28, 2023, Benson signed a three-year entry-level contract with the Sabres. On October 12, Benson made his NHL debut in a 5-1 loss against the New York Rangers. On October 14, Benson recorded his first points in the NHL, assisting on goals by Jordan Greenway and Casey Mittelstadt in a 3-2 loss against the New York Islanders. On November 22, Benson scored a between-the- legs goal for his first NHL goal in a 4-3 overtime loss to the Washington Capitals. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2005 births Category:Living people Category:Buffalo Sabres players Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Ice hockey people from British Columbia
